summary: This is an internal email chain from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding the organization and production of 3500 materials (discovery) for the case U.S. v. Ghislaine Maxwell. It references an upcoming Daubert hearing and the need to prepare additional materials.

events.title: Daubert Hearing
events.description: A Daubert hearing is scheduled, prompting the need for additional 3500 material production.

locations: U.S. Attorney's Office Southern District of New York, One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is internal correspondence from the prosecution team in U.S. v. Ghislaine Maxwell.
It discusses the ongoing production and organization of 3500 discovery materials.
A Daubert hearing is scheduled for the following day (November 10, 2021).
The email indicates more 3500 materials were expected to be produced later that day.
The correspondence shows the procedural workflow for handling discovery in the Maxwell case.
